question.Title: how to get list of processes that are bind to console window that I'm running in that would work also in windows 2000?
question.Body: The only thing I found is GetConsoleProcessList. The thing here is that this function doesn't work in Windows 2000. Is there any way to get around this issue, so it would work in all systems since win2k ? Is there another function that does similar thing ?

answer.Body: The GetConsoleProcessList function is only available on Windows XP/2003 and higher. Not on Windows 2000.
